meanings.definition: Not confined or directed within channels.
meanings.sent1: The river flowed unchanneled through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The unchanneled creativity of the children led to a colorful mural.
meanings.sent3: The unchanneled energy of the puppy caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her unchanneled emotions spilled out in a torrent of tears.
meanings.sent5: The unchanneled enthusiasm of the crowd was infectious.

meanings.sent1: The unchanneled market fluctuations caused uncertainty among investors.
meanings.sent2: His unchanneled anger often led to arguments with his friends.
meanings.sent3: The unchanneled excitement of the children on the playground was contagious.
meanings.sent4: Her unchanneled thoughts raced in all directions, making it hard to focus.
meanings.sent5: The unchanneled chaos of the city streets was overwhelming.
